sections.heading: Handwriting; proof by comparison; experts; jury
sections.text: Evidence respecting handwriting may be given by comparisons made, by experts or by the jury, with writing of the same person which is proved to be genuine.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 344, p. 451;R.S.1913, ยง 7912;C.S.1922, ยง 8854;C.S.1929, ยง 20-1220;R.S.1943
